title: Startup Finance Fundamentals
description: Start with basic financial terminology and concepts that serve as the foundation.

title: Burn Rate & Runway Calculations
description: Learn to track and project your company's cash position accurately.

title: Fundraising Mechanics
description: Understand how startup fundraising works from angels to Series B.

title: Cap Tables & Equity Management
description: Master the intricacies of equity splits, vesting, and dilution effects.

title: Unit Economics & Metrics
description: Calculate and optimize the core financial metrics that investors care about.
